name: ZetaChain Bridged POL.POL (ZetaChain)
description: ZetaChain bridged POL.POL on ZetaChain is a wrapped and bridged version of native Polygon held in our Polygon custody address. Users deposit native Polygon in our custody address, secured by MPC TSS. The protocol then issues a wrapped version equivalent, ZRC-20 on ZetaChain that be natively withdrawn back to the source chain or used in the ecosystem. Please see link below for liquidity caps and other token information: https://explorer.zetachain.com/liquidity
